summary: This is a letter from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York to the Metropolitan Detention Center, directing that discovery materials be provided to inmate Ghislaine Maxwell for her access. It is a formal legal communication related to her criminal case.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: She is the inmate at the Metropolitan Detention Center to whom discovery materials are to be provided, as part of the criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell.

locations: Silvio J. Mollo Building, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: The document is dated August 5, 2020, during the pendency of Ghislaine Maxwell's criminal case (20 Cr. 330).
It is a formal directive from the U.S. Attorney's Office to the detention facility to provide Maxwell with discovery materials.
Maxwell's inmate number is listed as 02879-509.
The document confirms Maxwell was in custody at the Metropolitan Detention Center in Brooklyn at that time.
